title: Living In The Present | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Living In The Present | Joel Osteen
description:
If you're always focused on your past or the future, you’ll miss what God is doing in the present. Don’t miss the blessings He prepared for this moment!

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
